description: Used Lit to build configuration application frontend from the ground up. Built complex features such as a faceted search page and infinite scrolling publication viewer. Created reusable components with documentation such as a folder tree component. Contributed to REST API design, testing and refactoring.

Worked directly with stakeholders to determine project requirements. Designed and implemented responsive web pages using mobile-first approach. Create headless blog using Gatsby/Wordpress and GraphQL.
